backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and booking requests with permission checks for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing AMP page requirements, canonical linking, indexing, and related test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Frontend deployment checklist including build steps, smoke tests, troubleshooting, and AMP validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint including Google verification and AMP discovery link to /amp/index.html.
frontend/public/amp/index.html: Standalone AMP‑compliant marketing page with required AMP scripts, boilerplate, and styled static content.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing full crawling and referencing sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing the canonical root and AMP landing page for indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component switching between marketing and admin views using local state.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form component handling input state, submission via React Query, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section showing address, phone, email, and hours using constants and icons.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and UI states.
Displays a grid of service cards with icons and descriptions for various travel services.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation, mobile menu, and admin navigation.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports business contact constants for email and phone numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookingReques: Fetches all booking requests for admin users using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/clear functions, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches the caller’s user role via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBookingReque: Mutation hook to submit booking requests and refresh admin queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRequestsPage.tsx: Admin-only booking request page with authentication, role checks, loading states, and error handling UI.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Public marketing landing page with hero section, services, booking form, contact info, and smooth scroll navigation.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Utility for generating correct static and generated asset URLs based on the app’s base path.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing AMP-related fixes, features, known issues, and requested improvements.
